question.questiontext: Since we know that Ammonia vapors are present and that it has the shortest breakthrough time, 46 min, what are three options for addressing the limitations of this suit?

options.option: Responders should change suits after each entry
Send responders in with Level B protection
Switch to a more appropriate suit with a higher breakthrough time
Do not allow responders to enter the hot zone
Limit responders' time in the hot zone to less than 46 minutes
